original_title: Magic Trolls and the Troll Warriors
overview: The evil King Nolaf and his Troll Warriors have conquered the once joyful kingdom of Everafter, imprisoned beautiful Princess Celia and banished all happiness from the land. Everafter's only hope lies with five Magic Trolls who have been placed in suspended animation. Princess Celia learns that it is her destiny to awaken the Magic Trolls who can save her land.
title: Magic Trolls and the Troll Warriors
